DocAttribute.Name: TotalCrossSectionArea
DocAttribute.Documentation: The total effective cross-section area of the reinforcement of a specific steel grade.

DocAttribute.Name: SteelGrade
DocAttribute.Documentation: The nominal steel grade defined according to local standards.

DocAttribute.Name: BarSurface
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indicator for whether the bar surface is plain or textured.

DocAttribute.Name: EffectiveDepth
DocAttribute.Documentation: The effective depth, i.e. the distance of the specific reinforcement cross section area or reinforcement configuration in a row, counted from a common specific reference point. Usually the reference point is the upper surface (for beams and slabs) or a similar projection in a plane (for columns).

DocAttribute.Name: NominalBarDiameter
DocAttribute.Documentation: The nominal diameter defining the cross-section size of the reinforcing bar. The bar diameter should be identical for all bars included in the specific reinforcement configuration.

DocAttribute.Name: BarCount
DocAttribute.Documentation: The number of bars with identical nominal diameter and steel grade included in the specific reinforcement configuration.
